data.name: Discontinue
data.description:
Discontinue is a unique competitive Virtual Reality (VR) Arcade game. The ultimate disc launching video game experience. With a retro neon game style. Your goal is to survive in a world of obstacles, where you are welcomed as its champion. As you move through this world, you will encounter all kinds of hexagons obstacles

The world consists of more than 1000 levels, each generated through a seed which you can share with a friend or a foe to compete for the high score. 

Every seed generates a unique level  by combining handcrafted level pieces. These pieces seamlessly connected in many different orders and variations. All to create action paced gameplay mixed with relaxed puzzle-like or transitional phases.

Tunnels are all about dodging and speed, whilst in the arenas you focus on standing your ground and defeating all obstacles in your way.
The various phases combined are designed to provide a rich and impactful cyber experience full of new VR action.

Are you up for this challenge?

translations.long_description:
Discontinue是一款独特的竞争虚拟现实（VR）街机游戏。终极光盘拍摄视频游戏体验。具有复古霓虹灯游戏风格。你的目标是在一个充满障碍的世界中生存，在那里你将受到欢迎。当你穿越世界中，你会遇到各种各样的障碍六角形

世界由超过一千个级别组成，每个级别由种子生成，您可以与朋友或敌人分享以争夺高分。

通过组合手工制作的水平件，每个种子产生独特的水平。这些作品以各种不同的顺序和变化无缝连接。所有这一切都是一个创造动作节奏，混合轻松拼图或过渡阶段的游戏。

隧道是关于逃避和速度的，在竞技场中，你专注于站在你的地面上并以你的方式击败所有障碍。
舞台组合旨在提供丰富且有影响力的网络体验，充满新的VR动作。

你准备好接受这个挑战吗
translations.short_description:
Discontinue是一款全新的复古房间VR街机游戏
所有这一切都是为了在霓虹灯氛围中释放光盘
使用您的光盘动作技能设置超过一千个级别的分数
与朋友和敌人竞争以获得新的高分

你愿意接受这个挑战吗
